summary: This is my customized layout for the Categorized Favorites Menu by favmenumodder. I created this set up for my conjuration character Bella. Simply put, I didn\'t like having all the magics in one long list, so I broke it up.
descriptionHtml:
Fav Menu - AP\'s Magical Layout by AggressivePassivist
=====================================================


Description
===========

This is my customized layout for the Categorized Favorites Menu by favmenumodder. I created this set up for my conjuration character Bella. Simply put, I didn\'t like having all the magics in one long list, so I broke it up. Also I don\'t use weapons and don\'t switch between a lot of armor. Weapons can be found in the Others spot, and armor in the Apparel slot ( if not hotkeyed). Honestly for shouts, I strongly suggest ThuuMic by DeadlyAzuril and PsychoHampster. It really frees up some time searching for shouts.
I also increased the font sizes a bit, due to a bit more space.

Required Mod:
=============

The Categorized Favorites Menu:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862



Suggested Mod ( if you change shouts a lot ):
=============================================

ThuuMic 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5626



Installation:
=============

Instal Categorized Favorites Menu Mod.

Copy this folder to your Skyrim Directory.

Go in game and open your Favorites Menu and enjoy.


I do suggest making a back up of the config files if you later change you mind. They can be found in:

Skyrim\\Data\\Interface\\ 



Thanks to:
==========

FavMenuModder for the original mod, and allowing others to customize it.

Bethesda for another great game.
author: AggressivePassivist
